plot: "Mr. O'Brien, of Barnum & Bailey's Circus, has a wonderful trained horse. It goes through all the steps of this much talked of dance to perfection, keeping perfect time with the music."
title: Horse Dancing Couchee Couchee
plot_es: "Mr. O'Brien, of Barnum & Bailey's Circus, has a wonderful trained horse. It goes through all the steps of this much talked of dance to perfection, keeping perfect time with the music."
plot_en: "Mr. O'Brien, of Barnum & Bailey's Circus, has a wonderful trained horse. It goes through all the steps of this much talked of dance to perfection, keeping perfect time with the music."
